full_summary:
### Tender Announcement
#### W8486-238883/A

The Department of National Defence is issuing this Request for Proposal (RFP) for the procurement of two Electronic and Communication Measuring and Testing Instruments, specifically the ETS Static Display Analyzer.

#### Tender Details
- **Reference**: cb-8793-7406750
- **Solicitation Number**: W8486-238883/A
- **Notice Date**: September 6, 2023
- **Closing Date**: October 6, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST
- **Estimated Contract Start Date**: October 9, 2023
- **Estimated Contract End Date**: January 31, 2024

#### Requirement
The department requires the delivery of two ETS Static Display Analyzers (NSN 6625 01-7074872, Part No. 4406) to Quality Engineering Test Establishment (45 Sacre-Coeur Blvd, Gatineau QC, J8X 1C6).

#### Preference
The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. A preference is given to Canadian goods and/or services.

#### Documents
The RFP document can be downloaded from the Canada Buys website at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca). Submissions can be made in either official language of Canada.

#### Contact Information
For any queries or clarification, please contact Justin Laundrie at (343) 571-8929 or justin.laundrie@forces.gc.ca. The address is 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa ON K1A 0K2.

#### Attachments
The RFP document is attached to this notice. Submissions should be made in accordance with the instructions outlined in the RFP document.

#### Note
This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and is open to all eligible suppliers. The Crown reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. All submissions will be evaluated in accordance with the evaluation criteria outlined in the RFP document.  



Please make sure to cross check if all the necessary information is covered. 

Thank you, and let me know if you have any further questions or need further assistance. 

Best, 
 [Your Name]

### Government Contract Information

If you are interested to get in contact with the procurement authorities, you can find the information below:

Contracting Entity Name:
* English: Department of National Defence
